But it seems like it's always orange. Fair point. The last time the threat level was a different color-- 2006-- Michael Vick was still the starting quarterback for the Falcons, Shirley Franklin was mayor of Atlanta and Dunwoody wasn't a city.

WASHINGTON- If the memoir of Donald Rumsfeld , among the most powerful and controversial secretaries of defense, catches on with readers and critics, he could cite one of his many`` Donald Rumsfeld 's Rules'': The harder I work, the luckier I am. In a statement posted at the center of Chrysler's home page Saturday, Sergio Marchionne said he regrets a term he used and considers it`` inappropriate.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, Sergio Marchionne 's statement said.`` I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate.'' Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery.

`` What I hope is that Kelsey Grammer and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children,'' her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series`` Cheers'' and`` Frasier.''
